about.name: Athens
about.info_text: Athens is the historic capital of Greece, known for its rich heritage and ancient landmarks. The city is the birthplace of democracy, philosophy, and theater, making it a hub for history and culture. Visitors can explore iconic sites such as the Acropolis, Parthenon, and the National Archaeological Museum. With a Mediterranean climate, Athens offers pleasant weather for most of the year, making it an ideal destination for both history enthusiasts and sun-seekers.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 664,046
Region: Attica
Time Zone: Eastern European Time (UTC+02:00)
Language: Greek
Currency: Euro (EUR)
about.climate_text: Athens has a Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters. Summer temperatures can exceed 30°C (86°F), while winter temperatures rarely drop below 10°C (50°F). Rainfall is highest in the winter months, and visitors can expect plenty of sunshine in the summer.

attractions_card.title: Acropolis
attractions_card.description: The Acropolis is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a symbol of ancient Greece. It features the iconic Parthenon, along with other historical structures, and offers panoramic views of Athens.

attractions_card.title: Plaka
attractions_card.description: Plaka is a charming, historic neighborhood nestled at the foot of the Acropolis. Visitors can explore its narrow streets, enjoy traditional Greek cuisine, and shop for souvenirs.

attractions_card.title: National Archaeological Museum
attractions_card.description: This museum houses a vast collection of ancient artifacts, sculptures, and art. It's a must-visit for those interested in Greek history and archaeology.

attractions_card.title: Monastiraki
attractions_card.description: Monastiraki is a lively area with a flea market, vibrant street life, and stunning views of the Acropolis. It's a great place to experience Athens' bustling atmosphere.

attractions_card.title: Odeon of Herodes Atticus
attractions_card.description: This ancient amphitheater hosts cultural events, including concerts and performances, set against the backdrop of the Acropolis.

attractions_card.title: National Garden of Athens
attractions_card.description: A green oasis in the heart of the city, this park offers a serene escape with walking paths, ponds, and a small zoo.

attractions_card.title: Benaki Museum
attractions_card.description: The Benaki Museum showcases a diverse collection of Greek art and historical items, offering insights into the nation's cultural evolution.

attractions_card.title: Temple of Olympian Zeus
attractions_card.description: This colossal ancient temple is dedicated to Zeus and is one of the city's most significant historical sites.

food_card.title: Moussaka
food_card.description: Moussaka is a traditional Greek dish made with layers of eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce. It's a delightful comfort food.

food_card.title: Souvlaki
food_card.description: Souvlaki is a popular Greek fast food consisting of small pieces of grilled meat, usually served with pita bread and toppings.

food_card.title: Greek Salad
food_card.description: A refreshing salad made with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and Greek dressing. It's a staple of Greek cuisine.

food_card.title: Baklava
food_card.description: Baklava is a sweet dessert made of layers of filo pastry, nuts, and honey. It's a delicious way to end a meal.

hotels_card.title: Hotel Grande Bretagne
hotels_card.description: A luxurious hotel in the heart of Athens with stunning views of the Acropolis. It offers upscale amenities, fine dining, and a rooftop pool.

hotels_card.title: Electra Palace Athens
hotels_card.description: A centrally located hotel with comfortable rooms, a rooftop restaurant, and a swimming pool overlooking the city.

hotels_card.title: AthensWas Design Hotel
hotels_card.description: A modern boutique hotel near the Acropolis, offering contemporary design, a rooftop bar, and excellent service.

hotels_card.title: The Margi
hotels_card.description: A stylish seaside hotel in the Athens Riviera, featuring a pool, spa, and access to the beach.

transport_card.title: Metro
transport_card.description: Athens' metro system provides efficient transportation around the city, including stops at key attractions and neighborhoods.

transport_card.title: Buses and Trams
transport_card.description: Buses and trams are convenient for reaching various parts of Athens, offering a cost-effective way to get around.

transport_card.title: Taxis
transport_card.description: Taxis are readily available in Athens and can be flagged down or booked in advance for convenient transportation.
